attributes.action: Ban the use of expanded polystyrene in packaging.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Expanded Polystyrene Packaging should be banned as it cannot be disposed of, and ends up in landfill sites, if its burnt it releases toxin's. It is not bio-degradable. All this when cardboard based alternatives are available which can easily be composted. Does a new microwave really warrant a waste packaging product that cannot be disposed of?
